release.notes: Documentation is in README.Config. 0.3.1 - E_ALL fixes
- some fixes - add WDDX-Container for config data in WDDX-files - add phpIniFile, does the same like IniFile but based on the PHP build-in function parse_ini_file()

- Only the first char of ->feature['cc'] is taken as a comment deliminator - quoting supports both methods: [bla] foo = "'bar'" bar = '"foo"' - Value parser only parser until first comment-char or the end of the string, therefore spaces surrounded by nonspaces don't have to be quoted.
- Bug fixed, when $feature in ParseInput was not set - some e_warnings fixed (thanks to Markus Fischer for the reports)
